code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{auth}from"../../../../firebaseConfig";import{createUserWithEmailAndPassword}from"firebase/auth";import'./Main_Input_Signup.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Main_Input_Signup=()=>{const[showPassword,setShowPassword]=useState(false);const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[error,setError]=useState("");const togglePasswordVisibility=()=>{setShowPassword(!showPassword);};const handleSignup=async()=>{try{await createUserWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password);alert("Sign Up Successful");setEmail("");setPassword("");}catch(err){setError(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Main_Input_Signup_Box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Main_Input_Signup_Email_Box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Main_Input_Signup_Email_Text",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"Main_Input_Signup_Email_Input",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Main_Input_Signup_Password_Box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Main_Input_Signup_Password_Text",children:"Set Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Main_Input_Login_Box_Password_Input_Container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:showPassword?"text":"password",className:"Main_Input_Login_Box_Password_Input",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"password-toggle-icon",onClick:togglePasswordVisibility,children:showPassword?'üëÅÔ∏è':'üëÅÔ∏è‚Äçüó®Ô∏è'})]})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:"red"},children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Main_Input_Signup_Sign_In_Btn",onClick:handleSignup,children:"Sign Up"})]});};export default Main_Input_Signup;
